text: Curt Hanson (1943 - June 16, 2017) was an American politician. He was born in Algona, Iowa. Curt was a member of the Iowa House of Representatives. A member of the Democratic Party, he served in the Iowa House from 2009 until his death in 2017, representing the 90th and 82nd Districts. Hanson died on June 16, 2017 at his home in Fairfield, Iowa of prostate cancer at the age of 73. ==References== ==Other websites== *Representative Kenneth Veenstra official Iowa General Assembly site * Category:1943 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Iowa Category:Educators from Iowa Category:Politicians from Iowa Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:State legislators of the United States
title: Curt Hanson
